product_name: belifAqua Bomb PHA Exfoliating Toner Pads
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean Ingredientsbelif Aqua Bomb Toner Pads are refreshing and dual-sided formulated with 2% PHA and provide skin with gentle, yet effective 2-in-1 exfoliating and toning benefits without drying out skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsBorn from the ultra-hydrating Aqua Bomb DNA, these gentle yet effective toner pads have a 3-in-1 multi-benefit formula to exfoliate, soothe, and hydrate skinDual-sided pad: Use the gauze side to aid the PHA with gentle physical exfoliation; use the embossed side for softer applicationEach pad is soaked in hydrating toner with 2% Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) that gently exfoliate dead skin cells and help to improve uneven skin texture, leaving skin looking radiantThe gentle cotton pads feel soft on skin and help to smooth skin textureSkin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and OilySkincare Concerns: Dryness, Acne and Blemishes, and OilinessKey Ingredients2% Polyhydroxy acid (PHA): gently exfoliates and improves uneven skin texture for a more radiant skin lookCentella asiatica (Cica): herbal ingredient that helps soothe skinPanthenol (Vitamin B5): helps soothe and hydrate the skinNapiers Original Formula: an herbal formula with herbs like oat kernel, Calendula flower, and Raspberry leaf for freshness and hydrationNapiers Aqua Formula: An herbal formula with herbs like Lady's mantle, Chickweed, and Nettle leaf that recharges moisture of skinResearch Results100% agree skin feels softer and smoother after use96.7% agree skin feels hydrated after use96.7% agree toner pads help to easily smooth out dead skin cellsBased on 7-day consumer perception study of 30 women ages 20 to 39Item 2607786How To UseAfter cleansing, wipe pad across face and neck. Use 1-3 times a week, adjust the use up to daily if desired. For both AM and PM. Follow with broad-spectrum sunscreen for the AM.Precautions: For external use only. Discontinue use if irritation or rash occurs. Do not use on broken or damaged skin. Avoid eye area. Do not store at extreme temperatures or in direct sunlight. There may be a slight color change in the product over time, but it does not change the performance. Do not leave pads on skin for a long time. Avoid direct contact with eyes. Do not flush.AHA+PHA Sunburn Alert This product contains Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) and Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. It is recommended that prior to exposure to the sun, users cover areas where AHAs and PHAs have been applied with sunscreen. Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency and duration.IngredientsWater/Eau, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Gluconolactone, Arginine, Panthenol, Allantoin, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Citric Acid, Inonotus Obliquus (Mushroom) Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Nepeta Cataria Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Leaf Extract, Baptisia Tinctoria Root Extract, Stellaria Media (Chickweed) Extract, Alchemilla Vulgaris Leaf Extract, Equisetum Arvense Leaf Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Leaf Extract, Bakuchiol, Beta-Glucan, Corchorus Olitorius Leaf Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Citral.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After cleansing, wipe pad across face and neck. Use 1-3 times a week, adjust the use up to daily if desired. For both AM and PM. Follow with broad-spectrum sunscreen for the AM.Precautions: For external use only. Discontinue use if irritation or rash occurs. Do not use on broken or damaged skin. Avoid eye area. Do not store at extreme temperatures or in direct sunlight. There may be a slight color change in the product over time, but it does not change the performance. Do not leave pads on skin for a long time. Avoid direct contact with eyes. Do not flush.AHA+PHA Sunburn Alert This product contains Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) and Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. It is recommended that prior to exposure to the sun, users cover areas where AHAs and PHAs have been applied with sunscreen. Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency and duration.

reviews.headline: The Perfect Toning Pads
reviews.comments: Love everything about these toning pads. They gently exfoliate without irritating my skin and they leave my skin looking fresh and hydrated.

reviews.headline: Can't be without these for too long
reviews.comments: Belif discontinued these for a period of time and I wasn't able to replace them once I ran out. I scoured the internet for a backup supply because they are really that good. My skin doesn't tolerate many products well and it's on the dry side, so I wasn't expecting these to really be all that moisturizing. They really are though, and they give skin this beautiful glass glow. My skin loved them and they helped keep it clear and smooth. definite HG, the only product from them I really feel makes a difference.

reviews.headline: i enjoy this STILL
reviews.comments: i usually pair the toner pads with an actual toner, and with the two, my face is SO soft. i used to bave all these little bumps around my ears snd chin and within a few days of using these in the morning, they were gone.

reviews.headline: perfect toner pads
reviews.comments: These toner pads felt amazing on my skin - very refreshing and did not make skin feel tight or dry, just super clean and smooth.   For the price, the jar contains alot of toner pads. I would definately recommend and will be repurchasing.

reviews.headline: The GLOW
reviews.comments: This is my new go to toner! It exfoliates the flakes, hydrates, and tones down my redness/splotches. I have very sensitive acne prone skin and after a week of use I've noticed my skin looks much more even and healthy. Love the moisturizer too!

rollup.name: Aqua Bomb PHA Exfoliating Toner Pads
